## `SetDomainRestriction`

Sets the domains restrictions that the web harvester is using while crawling.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetDomainRestriction(DomainRestriction restriction)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| [`DomainRestriction`](#domainrestriction) restriction | Which domains can files be downloaded from while harvesting. |

### See also {-}

[`AddAllowableDomain()`](#addallowabledomain)
:::
